snippet: The Senate blocked a new measure aimed at protecting America’s vulnerable computer networks from cyberattacks, leaving the nation at grave risk.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Senate Republicans for blocking a measure aimed at protecting America's vulnerable computer networks, due to complaints from the business community; urges Senate Republicans to work with Democrats to pass a credible cybersecurity bill.
lead_paragraph: The Senate blocked a new measure aimed at protecting America’s vulnerable computer networks from cyberattacks, leaving the nation at grave risk.
